name: ★ Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave (StatTrak)
description: The Driver Gloves | Crimson Weave feature a rich, red weave pattern with a luxurious texture. Their bold and elegant design is perfect for players who want to make a statement.

attributes.value: CS2 Skins is a collection of digital weapon skins from Counter-Strike 2. Each skin is a unique combination of weapon type, rarity, and design, allowing collectors to own a piece of gaming history. The collection celebrates the iconic designs that have become part of gaming culture.
